text: Viktor Yefimovich Slesarev (; 5 August 1949 â€“ 14 July 2022) was a Russian football player and manager. He was known for playing for FC SKA-Khabarovsk between 1970 and 1972. He also managed FC Zvezda Perm from 1984 to 1994. Slesarev died on 14 July 2022 in Perm, Russia at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian football managers Category:Russian footballers
title: Viktor Slesarev
